pullRequest.title: [Issue-2566] Exit teku if eth1 service fails to start up
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
The eth1 service is critical for validators.  If the eth1 service fails to start up, throw a fatal exception and exit.
Fixed Issue(s)
Part of #2566
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: If Eth1DepositManager fails to start, throw fatal error and exit

nodes.bodyText: Just to confirm, this doesn't apply when the ETH1 node is down at startup right? We should keep retrying in that case until the node comes up.  Otherwise it gets very difficult to coordinate services properly in things like docker-compose.

commit.message: Use utility to collect list of throwable causes
Add some tests to verify startup behavior
